nodes.text: An Ithorian cantina patron and his Quarren friend were approached in the cantina in Dreshdae on Korriban in 3993 BBY by Duron Qel-Droma and Shaela Nuur, who were on Korriban on a mission for the Jedi Order, looking for a terentatek. The Ithorian and Quarren agreed to provide the Jedi with information that could help them on their quest. Their payment was credits inquivalent to one kilo of spice.
